Posts.Content: That should be checked there is a breast cancer that does not involve lumps called inflammatory breast cancer it is rare . Does that breast feel larger and have indentations ? Is it warm to touch ? I hope it all goes well. Do not think that you are hypochondriac , your health and your life matter. Report 1
Posts.Title: inverted nipple & crazy dreams

Posts.Content: They say Breast Cancer is painless, but my tumor was very painful. Best to get a mammogram or have your md do a physical breast exam. Good luck to you, hopefully it is hormonal Report Reply
